type: Digital Collaboration and Information Management M365 (DCIM-M365)

description: PROVISION OF INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES TO PROVIDE THE END-TO-END IMPLEMENTATION OF M365 AS AN ELECTRONIC DOCUMENT AND RECORDS MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (EDRMS) SOLUTION TO SUPPORT RCMP IN THE CONTINUED.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Digital Collaboration and Information Management M365

**Reference Number:** WS4263751949
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** WS4263751949

**Publication Date:** November 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Date:** December 8, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** TBC
**Expected Contract End Date:** TBC

**Tender Status:** Expired

**UNSPSC:** 80101507
**UNSPSC Description:** Information Technology Consultation Services

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity:**
------------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:**
------------------

* Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R2, Canada

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

* Carlos Cabannes (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: carlos.cabannes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18019396?extsite=MTgwMTkzOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**

This tender is for the provision of Informatics Professional Services to implement Microsoft 365 as an Electronic Document and Records Management System (EDRMS) solution for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). Only TBIPS SA Holders with a Tier 2 SA in the required resource categories, in the National Capital Region, are eligible to compete. The contract will be awarded for 2 years, with 3 one-year irrevocable options. Bids must be submitted by December 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

Please note that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on the closing date
